name: r2exf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wn(w0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wn(w0)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wn(w0)))))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))
-| wnfc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Double restricted existential quantification. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.) Use ~ r2exlem . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jan-2020.)
